footer.title: Tabi Office
footer.place_of_issue: Place of issue: Department of Planning and Investment of Ho Chi Minh City

section_1.slogan: Experience a sophisticated and luxurious space!

carousel_content_1.title: Professionalism
carousel_content_1.content: Devoting ourselves to tea brewing for more than 2 decades, we've been insisting on repeating each detail and striving towards perfection. The process is never tiresome, and we will insist on the spirit forever.

carousel_content_2.title: Art Area
carousel_content_2.content: Devoting ourselves to tea brewing for more than 2 decades, we've been insisting on repeating each detail and striving towards perfection. The process is never tiresome, and we will insist on the spirit forever.

carousel_content_3.title: Humanistic Quality
carousel_content_3.content: Professionalism is a must, and we are dedicated to providing the best quality. We are committed to the pursuit of excellence, and we will never stop.

section_4.title: Reliable Quality
section_4.content: Quality is more than just a commitment - it's a trusted feature of every meal. Fresh ingredients and professional baking processes create unique culinary experiences, always ensuring the quality standards we promise.
